channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Dubbo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Dubbo

item.title: CVE-2019-17564|2024-08-05T01:40:15.977Z -- apache -- apache%20dubbo
item.description: Unsafe deserialization occurs within a Dubbo application which has HTTP remoting enabled. An attacker may submit a POST request with a Java object in it to completely compromise a Provider instance of Apache Dubbo, if this instance enables HTTP. This issue affected Apache Dubbo 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions.
